My second Bioshock game after the first Bioshock, I was blown away whilst playing the first Bioshock and I was a little bit skeptical about the Bioshock Infinite, I thought the engine, AI, yadayada are gonna be the same, well yeah, but they improved wayyyyy to much that it...I'm speechless actually, and let's go straight to the point. 
Characters have their own history (deep ones)
Amazing AI behind Elizabeth (and enemies and main antagonists as well)
Stunning graphics (sorry consoles players)
Best story line, better than Twilight, some plot twists.
Innovative shooter (although it kinda existed before in the first Bioshock) 
I believe I'm half way there and I'm thanking for it, I cannot bear the fact that this storyline's gotta end somewhere. There are two types of gamer, those who played Bioshock Infinite and those who do not, if you are consider buying this game, don't, just buy it.

Bioshock Infinite - что можно сказать, просто шикарная игра которая не уступает своим двум предшественникам.

Из плюсов:

- Графика/звук/детализация все на высоком уровне.
- Сюжет просто не даст вам скучать, намного превосходит предыдущие части, вы тут и злодей, герой, убийца, похититель, освободитель, герой войны, революционер, мессия и жертва в одном лице.
- Для любителей потеребонькать и феминисток тут есть красотка которая бегает за вами и помогает старому извращенцу всем чем может.
- Концовка игры очень БОЛЬШОЙ И ЖИРНЫЙ плюс, в стиле биошока, во первых мы перенесемся в первую часть на немножко, во вторых неожиданный поворот в конце.

Из минусов:

- Немножко раздражает что нету русской озвучки, но это не проблема так как можно поставить русификатор с полной озвучкой и текстурами.
- Доп контент дороговат, а проходится за пару часов да еще и поделили на две части по 10 бачей за штуку, которых они не стоят, но этот минус никак не влияет на сам Bioshock Infinite, а больше является ответвлением к альтернативной ветки событий ( в котором есть ответвление к первым двум частям и для любителей франшизы я все же рекомендую для ознакомления)

Вывод: 

- Шикарный шутер лучший из всей трилогии
- Общая оценка 9,5/10
- Это только мое мнение и я вас не принуждаю ни к каким действиям или альтернативной точки зрения...

这个游戏的童话风格真的很吸引人。但玩着玩着就感到童话只是表面上的东西。真正的风格则是血腥加恐怖！优化可以，我集显也能玩。

Bioshock Infinite is one of the games with the most character you can find, it nails the atmosphere, making you feel like you are in the middle of a complicated political war. The characters are all good and the graphics are breathtaking.

The gun play is good but I felt like the hook could have been made less necesary (the were part where if you weren't hanging from lane to lane it was really difficult not to die). Carrying only 2 weapons was also a bit annoying but nothing really bad. Also by the end I just wanted the gun parts to stop because after like 12 hrs of them I just wanted the story to advance.

Which takes me to the story... Oh...my...god... Even without the ending (which made my head explode) the story is amazing and the characters feel like they are real people with flaws. Anyone willing to hear me talking about this game had a lecture about the story haha I was like 2 weeks looking for videos explaining details and theories. And the fact that there are details that make sense only after the ending make the second playthrough enjoyable because of the "Oh my god, I didn't notice that" or "Now this makes senses" moments.

The gameplays has flaws (nothing major at least for me) but the amazing storyline makes up for that. This is a beautiful and interesting game that gives you a lot to talk about and discuss. 9/10 for me :).

Oyunun birkaç eksik yanı elbette var ancak uzun bir inceleme yapmak niyetinde değili, sonuç itibariyle verdiğiniz paranın her kuruşunu hakeden kesinlikle oynamanız gereken, FPS türünün en özgün yapımlarından biri.
Alın,oynayın hele indirimdeyse sakın kaçırmayın.

夏季趁着特价入手这部人称神作的FPS作品。很早之前玩过生化奇兵1的我，其实第一次对那种画风感到兴趣不大…直到这一作让我这这个系列另我刮目相看。开场不久去到天堂的瞬间…居然让人大呼过瘾，奇幻的风格，天上漂浮的汽车，升气球…全部都在眼前出现，那个画面更加像小时候童话中想象的场景是一模一样。当主角拿起武器的那种血腥程度其实有一定的煞风景…感觉画风突变，之前还停留在童话般的世界，突然间就暴力了…不过这种情况很多就会习惯，当然我不知道其他第一次进去游戏的时候，是否都会走到每一处的地方截图，而不是忙着做主线？至少我是这样做了，因为进来的瞬间，在我脑海中只想截图分享…分享一个奇妙的世界，不过个人玩久了有一点头重的感觉，需要关闭休息一下。防眩晕的效果虽然说不错，但还没到极致的效果…至于剧情的发展，暂时还没体验到核心位置。不过前期的交代已经足够了，至少不会让人很懵。你的首要目标就是找出伊丽莎白…至于后期剧情，我还是慢慢体验着这个另我着迷的世界，一边做任务吧！
如果嫌平时价格高的话，那么现在夏季特价一定是你的不二之选！童话般的完美世界，外加上精彩的剧情…U3引擎的画面表现力，绝对是一个超值的游戏！

Con:
It's got about 8 hours of actual gameplay, and it's frustrating because at the end you'll definitely want more

The first thing I have to say about BioShock Infinite is that the graphics are absolutly beautiful, you can't go wrong when it comes to stunning shades and colour to a game! Just everything with graphic quality for this game is a 10/10 ! and the story line is a must play through, has good audio and voice acting too. There is no multiplayer for bioshock infinite but that honestly dosen't matter because the story line is so good and in detail ! also there is alot to do and explore so if it was from me and i'm sure so many others would agree with me! THIS GAME IS A MUST BUY & PLAY! I have an MSI gaming computer and it runs it at 1280x720 on Ultra settings with everything turned on and it runs at 60 and even 80 frames at times so I'm pretty sure most decent pc can run this but no problem if you haven't got a good gaming pc just turn the settings on low and the game will for sure be playable :) 

Overall: Stunning graphics, audio, story, gameplay and just everything about this game is amazing even so is the DLC content! 

I give Bioshock Infinite a big thumbs up and 10/10! MUST PLAY!

Esse jogo é simplesmente LINDO, não somente em visual, seu gameplay é totalmente viciante, a história cada vez vai te cativando mais e você sempre quer saber o que vem á seguir. Cenarios LINDISSIMOS e música de extrema qualidade, varios ester eggs para descobrir, e acima de tudo, é muito divertido. O jogo te prende do começo ao fim, e vale cada segundo.
A dificuldade do jogo é proporcional com como você vai evoluindo seu personagem, quais armas você vai melhorar, habilidades que vai usar(vigors) e seu estilo de gameplay é claro, da pra ir mais no steath ou ir metendo o F0d@-s3 e botar o pau na mesa, e claro, a Elisabeth, como não falar desse serumaninho que mal conheço e já considoro pacas? cara, que personagem carismatico, sério. Só por esse personagem já vale o jogo em sí, é o tipo de personagem que você realmente quer ajudar, que aliás te ajuda, e MUITO, na gameplay.

Caso alguem tenha algum tipo de duvida sobre se compra ou não, é um jogo que realmente vale a pena, se você curte FPS e uma boa história. 
Esse jogo mudou totalmente meu conceito sobre jogos sigle player.

Se tiver um filho algum dia vai se chamar Elisabeth, mesmo se for homem.
10/10 facil.

Bir oyunun sahip olması gereken herşeye sahip,harika bir kurgu ve hikaye,her oyuncuya hıtap edecek bir dunya,kendini hemen sevdiren inanılmaz karakterler,bu oyunda hepsı var,inanılmaz ve fantastik bir dunyaya sahıp muhtesem bır oyun,kendini hemen sevdiren Elizabeth i unutmamak lazım , hikayesine ve o fantastık dunyaya ,ınsanlarına hayran kaldım.Güzel manzaraları ve kurgusu hele ozellıkle de o zaman yolculukları ve kapılar kafamı ıyıce karıstırdı,oyunun sonu hıc beklenmedık ve muhtesem oldu. kesinlikle herkese oynamasını tavsıye ederim.şimdiden iyi eglenceler.
